en_text: This will be one hell of a present, huh?
jp_text:
フフッ…
盛大なプレゼントになるな
google_translated:
Fufu ...
Do not be a grand present

en_text: I just wish I could've told her...
jp_text: 伝えたかったな あいつに…

en_text: Ichigo?!
jp_text:
（せきこみ）
（ゴロー）イチゴ！

en_text: Wow... The air's thin in here.
jp_text: 酸素 薄い…

en_text: Why'd you come?
jp_text: なんで来たんだ…

en_text: And I told you that I'd be all right!
jp_text: 絶対に助けるって言ったじゃん
google_translated: I told you to help you absolutely

en_text: You're an idiot, so I knew you'd try \Nto fix everything by yourself.
jp_text:
ゴローはバカだからさ すぐ
１人で解決しようとするんだもん
google_translated:
Goro is stupid, so soon
I'm going to solve it alone

en_text: Even though you can't do \Nanything without me...
jp_text:
１人じゃ勝てなくても
２人なら勝てる
google_translated:
Even if you don't win alone
Win 2 people

en_text: You were willing to cry for me.
jp_text: お前が俺のために泣いてくれる

en_text: I thought I was satisfied \Njust knowing that...
jp_text:
それが分かっただけで…
それだけで十分だと思ってた
google_translated:
I just knew it ...
I thought it was enough

en_text: until a moment ago.
jp_text: さっきまでは

en_text: But now, seeing your face as you smile at me
jp_text:
でも 今は
こうして お前の顔が見れて—
google_translated:
But now
Such a face of her your face

en_text: Roger!
jp_text: （ゾロメ）よっしゃ！

en_text: They're out!
jp_text: （ヒロ）出た！

en_text: Huh?
jp_text:
（ゴロー）全機 一斉離脱！
（ミク）えっ？

en_text: Oh...
jp_text: あっ…　イチゴ　髪留めは？
google_translated: Oh ... What is the hairdo haircut?

en_text: You picked it up for me?
jp_text: なんだ　拾ってくれてたんだ？

en_text: Nah. This is something I wanted \Nto give you, but couldn't.
jp_text:
これは 俺がイチゴに
渡そうと思って 渡せなかったやつ
google_translated:
This is Ichigo
A guy who did not pass and passed

en_text: I just felt like telling you.
jp_text: 俺が勝手に言いたくなっただけだ
google_translated: I just wanted to say myself

en_text: I don't want to regret things anymore.
jp_text:
そういう後悔
もうしたくねえんだ
google_translated:
Such regret
I want to do it anymore

en_text: I-I had something to say to you, too!
jp_text:
ゴローに会ったら
言わなきゃって思ってた
google_translated:
If you meet Goro
I thought I had to say

en_text: Thank you for being my partner.
jp_text:
ありがとう
私のパートナーでいてくれて
google_translated:
Thank you
He is my partner

en_text: I'm not expecting an answer or anything.
jp_text: 答えを望んでるとかじゃないからさ
google_translated: It is not because I want to hope for the answer

en_text: But let me stay like this for a while.
jp_text: せめて ちょっとだけ こうさせて…
google_translated: Let's do it for a while ...

en_text: What's the outlook for tomorrow?
jp_text:
（ゴロー）
あしたの天気は何だろう？

en_text: Right now, you're impossible to forecast.
jp_text: 今の君は予想がつかない
